data.text:
#LearningAtWork Learning never stops at Bajaj Markets! üöÄ Over 16 immersive hours, 30 dedicated employees engaged in SHINE, our leadership program designed to shape minds, evaluate possibilities, and drive innovation. A special thanks to Suchismita Burman for guiding us and making us ready to navigate & lead in a changing workplace. üëè Ashish Panchal Sourabh P Banerjee Ranjit Menon Shantanu Mitra Jolly Ramtri Amita Vyas Sakshi Gomai #SHINE #LearningAndDevelopment #BajajMarkets #Leaders

#WeAreHiring We're expanding our team! Join our dynamic team and help us innovate. If you or someone you know is passionate and driven, apply now or tag them in the comments! üôå Apply now: https://lnkd.in/dGJwi5Rs Shantanu Mitra Prateek Jain Ronnie Dias Rohit Krishna Suman Kumar Manish Pathania Aditya Kakade CA Anurag Nandargi Himanshu Agarwal Kirti N. #FunAtWork Chess is not just a game; it's a mindset that enhances strategic thinking and patience.‚ôüÔ∏è Our recent office chess competition brought out the best in our team, showcasing their brilliant tactics and camaraderie. Congratulations to all participants and our champion Mateesh Bhave! Let's keep pushing boundaries, one move at a time. Ranjit Menon Apurv Joshi Atul V Chandran

#LeadersAtWork Join our Executive Vice President, Sourabh P Banerjee as he delves into the innovative offerings of #BajajMarkets, your one stop financial marketplace. Discover how we're leveraging Gen AI and cutting-edge technology to enhance our services and deliver unparalleled value to our customers in today's digital age. ‚úÖ #Leaders #Finance #GenAI #Technology #FinancialServices

At our monthly townhall, our leaders shared key business updates and inspired us all with their vision. Their words not only reminded us of our collective strength but also energized the team, reinforcing our collective drive to achieve greatness together. üíºüöÄ Sourabh P Banerjee Ranjit Menon Prateek Jain Manish Kalyani Manish Pathania Bharath Kollipara Ananth S B. Priyanka Khinvasara Amita Vyas Aishwarya Inchalkar #Townhall #MonthlyUpdates #BajajMarkets
